lyric:
[by:suming1997]
[ar: Sissel Kyrkjebo]
[ti: Weightless]
[al: Sissel]
[by: suming1997]
[length: 04:50]
[00:33.97]All of my life
[00:39.16]I have been waiting
[00:44.29]Wondering what I will do
[00:49.37]
[00:52.37]All I can feel
[00:57.30]Is my heart beating
[01:02.07]Time and time again for you
[01:09.19]
[01:14.00]And I'm weightless, falling in love
[01:20.39]I am weightless
[01:24.58]And I don't know why but I know
[01:31.15]It's all right
[01:33.40]
[01:42.71]All I can hear
[01:47.46]Is my own breathing
[01:52.72]Echo in my loneliness
[01:57.41]
[02:00.73]If I could sleep
[02:05.73]I would be dreaming
[02:10.62]Of the sweetness of your kiss
[02:17.75]
[02:22.44]And I'm weightless, falling in love
[02:28.89]I am weightless
[02:33.07]And I don't know why but I know
[02:39.51]It's all right
[02:42.08]
[02:43.70]And I'm weightless, falling in love
[02:49.84]I am weightless
[02:53.96]And I'm so high, I'm with my angel tonight
[03:03.16]
[03:33.71]And I'm weightless, falling in love
[03:39.78]I am weightless
[03:44.10]And I don't know why but I know
[03:49.98]It's so right
[03:54.57]And I'm weightless, falling in love
[04:01.00]I am weightless
[04:05.32]And I'm so high, I'm with my angel tonight
[04:19.21]
[04:21.96]I am weightless
[04:26.15]And I'm so high, I'm with my angel tonight
[04:41.03]
tlyric:
[by:微凉晚风与浩瀚星空]
[00:33.97]我的一生中
[00:39.16]我一直在等待
[00:44.29]想知道自己会做什么
[00:52.37]我唯一能感受到的
[00:57.30]是我的怦怦心跳
[01:02.07]一次次为你跳动
[01:14.00]如失重一般，坠入爱河
[01:20.39]如失重一般
[01:24.58]我不清楚为什么，但我知道
[01:31.15]那很好
[01:42.71]我所能听到的
[01:47.46]只剩我自己的呼吸声
[01:52.72]在孤独里回响着
[02:00.73]如果我在睡梦中
[02:05.73]我会正梦着
[02:10.62]与你的甜蜜一吻
[02:22.44]如失重一般，坠入爱河
[02:28.89]如失重一般
[02:33.07]我不清楚为什么，但我知道
[02:39.51]那很好
[02:43.70]如失重一般，坠入爱河
[02:49.84]如失重一般
[02:53.96]如同身在九重云霄，今夜有我的天使相伴
[03:33.71]如失重一般，坠入爱河
[03:39.78]如失重一般
[03:44.10]我不清楚为什么，但我知道
[03:49.98]那很好
[03:54.57]如失重一般，坠入爱河
[04:01.00]如失重一般
[04:05.32]如同飘入云端，今夜有我的天使相伴
[04:21.96]如失重一般
[04:26.15]如同飘入云端，今夜有我的天使相伴
